1441660.name: Fantasy Grounds - Destroyer of Worlds
1441660.description:
Destroyer of Worlds

The mission was a manhunt, the objectives clear--track down four fugitives, recover any assets they may have made off with, and keep 'em all out of enemy hands. Go find them on a frozen moon full of hostiles and get it done on the eve of war.
Nothing you couldn't handle.
But what it is that these bastards stole--and how the hell it got inside them--is another thing altogether. It's all above your paygrade, marine--but somehow you're the one who's got to deal with it.
Of course, now there's an invasion fleet incoming, and there's something else, too--something much worse. Something out there hates you--hates everyone. Something big and ugly. Something with metal teeth--and you're pretty sure it ain't alone.
Yeah, the mission was supposed to be a simple manhunt. Instead it turned out to be just another glorious day in the corps.
Destroyer of Worlds is a complete Cinematic Scenario for the ALIEN roleplaying game, written by sci-fi novelist Andrew E.C. Gaska just like
Chariot of the Gods . In
Destroyer of Worlds , players take the roles of Colonial Marines. The scenario is designed for 3-5 players plus the Game Mother, and it's a gauntlet of one hell after another. Expect it to take three sessions to complete.
The digital conversion includes the following:
  • 7x pre-generated characters
  • 10x NPC and 2x abominations
  • More than 55x high-resolution images of from the box set
  • Portrait pack
  • 29x locations linked to each deck plan
  • More than 90x story entries from the reference manual for ease of use
  • 20x items
  • 20x NPCs including xenomorphs
  • 1x new system
  • 25x agendas
  • 5x new tables
  • 8x vehicles
Notes : Some items and vehicles are duplicate from the ALIEN RPG, ruleset but are placed here for convenience and completion.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Pixeldiet and Aleksandar Velkov
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Alien Roleplaying Game ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
